tasks.title: Add code_refs frontmatter to documentation
tasks.description: Link documentation pages to relevant code excerpts in code-excerpts.json using a code_refs frontmatter field
acceptance_criteria: At least 50 high-priority docs have code_refs frontmatter
docs-summary.json includes code_refs for each doc

tasks.title: Implement documentation versioning groundwork
tasks.description: Enable version-specific documentation and API endpoints to support multiple product versions
acceptance_criteria: Docs can have version frontmatter field
Agent endpoints can filter by version

usage_notes: Tasks are sourced from docs/planning/TODO_*.md files
AI agents should read planning_doc for full implementation details
Mark tasks complete by updating the planning doc status
